Reviews.Title: Yes, it does work to record video, no i am not a rep for the company
Reviews.Author: Linda & Jamie
Reviews.Content: Hi, i thought i would throw my 2 cents in because people seem to think a lot of reviews were provided by company reps or something. I agree, there is a lot of peachy statements being made, but I wanted to provide the view from someone who has a home video system setup with 8 camera's, all of them outdoors, and this cam is one at the front of the house. It DOES record, no issue there, plugged it in, and when i get motion, i get recording, my system is NightOwl, and again, yes, it records video just fine. The video daytime is great, not perfect, not $1000 camera resolution, but good enough for sure. The night vision is not top notch, but not shabby either, you can certainly figure out who the individual is, as i have busted friends doing "Boo's" at Halloween (that was fun), and also busted a thief stealing a UPS package, police love the video. So although we may have some bright & cheery people writing reviews or we have some company reps (hey, it could happen), either way, take it from someone who is just a normal individual using the cam's at home, they work. Now, for the bad.... this cam only lasted 1 year before it stopped working, the video on that channel is now off one day on the next, for some reason the cam has issues and needs to be replaced. Is it an issue with all of them? No. But this one didnt last but 1 year, could just be that 1 isolated physical camera.  So, make your own decisions, hope this review helps.

Reviews.Title: Night vision at 50 feet.....No way
Reviews.Author: R. L. Vance
Reviews.Content: I got the camera up and running after a small clitch. I ordered 2  150ft cables for the camera. The cables came with BNC to RCA connectors but no Female to Female BNC connectors. I bought those at Radio Shack at an extremely high mark up ($4.00) each....Now to the camera. Good picture during day light hours but kind of a ghost shadow in partial sunlight. I'll try some adjustments(moving the camera as no adjustments on the camera itself)....As for the night vision capabilities. I think it said something about 50 to 60 feet with the infered lighting ...NO WAY, 10 to 15 feet tops. I bought this to record my mailbox becauce of vandalism. I tried it from about 50 feet and got no image of the Mailbox, then closer and still no image finally I but it about 10 feet and a good picture emerged.  One more drawback is that a car with the lights on(NIGHT VISION AGAIN)Leaves a blur as the lighted car goes by. It may sound like I am slamming this product. I am not. For the price if you wanted close to home security, good. But for detailed night vision at a 50 to 60 foot range forget about it. I also did not mention that I connected the system to my computer using  the Honestech VHS to DVD 5.0 Deluxe system I bought a few months ago on Amazon. This product does VHS tapes to DVD on your computer but also acts as a devise to hook the camera up to record on your PC. Overall review. Good cheap security, will not do 50 feet of night vision , 10 to 15 feet tops maybe 20 with a NEW MOON. Easy to get and running.... follow up to my review.I caught the guys vandalizing my mailbox. The sheriff was able to use the video I had to confront the little boogers. I did not press charges but the camera did its job

Reviews.Title: Solid device. Superior for the price.
Reviews.Author: John-David Hughes "dewildman"
Reviews.Content: This is one of a number of devices I have purchased for a variety of modestly sized security systems. I find the images during daylight to be excellent for the application (access and egress points) and the nighttime IR works surprisingly well. I would commend these to a buyer who needs 'bang for the buck', has some modest exterior application issues (wind, salt air, rain). Would suggest a dome for snow/icy conditions.Easy to install, works from the moment it is plugged in, with no hitches, problems, or issues. The components are sturdy and I expect to use more of these devices in the future. The 420 TVL deliver good facial recognition, the color is good, but the night capabilities are especially good for the number of IR LEDs.

Reviews.Title: Works well.  Does what it's supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: R
Reviews.Content: The camera was easy to hook up.  The picture looks good night and day.  It has more of a fish eye lens which allows you to get a wider viewing angle which I actually like.  Have these installed on the house and have no complaints.  It's not going to give you HD video quality but you can certainly make out what you're looking at.

Reviews.Title: Does What I Need It To Do
Reviews.Author: Srvguy
Reviews.Content: There is quite a bit of construction going on in my area right now.  I needed a camera that I could easily setup to overlook my front drive to give me some security while I was not home.  The camera arrived packaged securely and looked exactly as shown.  I spent a lot of time researching cameras and decided to go with this one for two reasons.  First, the previous reviews were very complimentary of the camera.  Second, the price.For my setup, I have two baluns connected to the camera.  For anyone unfamiliar with the term balun (like I was) these are signal converters that will allow you to transmit the power and video signal across a cat5E or cat6 cable.  Which is much cheaper than running power and video as two separate signals.  Plus, the baluns are relatively inexpensive.  The camera is connected to a pc through a USB video grabber and running Yawcam.  This allows me to treat my camera like an IP camera that can be viewed from anywhere with my Android phone or my wife's Iphone, which is what I really wanted.  IP cameras that do this all one were consistently reviewed as unreliable and the reliable ones were very expensive.  This was a much cheaper alternative, for my needs.The picture of the camera fits my needs.  It is clear to about 25 feet away.  From that point on, you can still easily see shapes and colors, but you would not be able to make out a license plate.  This camera does have night vision that allows you to see to about that 25 foot mark fairly easily, it will not reach past that on my tests.The camera dome does get a little warm to the touch.  I was worried at first, when I initially set it up.  However, this seems to be a characteristic of the unit.  It is still functioning fine after two weeks of continuous use.I really wanted to see how a security camera would fit into my needs before jumping all in on a more expensive unit.  Somewhere down the road I may upgrade from this one.  If something happens to it, then I am not out that much expense.  I would purchase one again in the immediate future, as long as it remains the cheapest alternative.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality. I used this for my owl security system. Installation was fast with the existing cables. I even used the owl's power supply. The camera is of good quality, it gives me about a 40 ft wide view and I can see clearly over 50ft away during day time and a good 25 feet at nigh. If I turn on my flood lights, I can see as good as day. The picture is very clear. I bought this as a test. Now, I will upgrade all my cameras with these. Well worth it. My local surveillance shop wanted $77.00 for a similar camera. Delivery was extremely fast.

Reviews.Title: Should have spent more money
Reviews.Author: G. B. "Strapperman"
Reviews.Content: Installed this camera to add to my network. Lasted 3 months then developed blurred spot in center. Will stay away from video secure as my Lorex with the most exposure to the Sun works perfect after 4 years.

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: Vernon R Allen
Reviews.Content: I received the item as advertised except the included wrench was not there.  I connected it up to a dvr and there was no problem interfacing it.  The picture however was extremely dark during the daytime.  I tried it in a dark room and the infrared worked okay but daylight was just too much for this unit.  I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommend
Reviews.Author: Robert Spencer
Reviews.Content: Make sure if you have a wireless N router you buy the one that supports N.  Watched vidoes on you tube (Hamster) and read instructions on Foscam web site for about 5 hours before it arrived.  Once it arrived I had it up and running over the internet in about 1 hour.  I still cannot get the email function to work when it senses motion and sends you a picture.  Have tried everything.  Seems to be a familiar problem.  I put it at my mothers house.  She is 83 years old and I can keep an eye on her from 800 miles away.  This is a really cool product.  Works great so far.  Plan on getting more in the future.  Tech support called back after 2 hours from leaving a message for a few questions I had.  Picture is excellent.  Pick up sounds real nice also.

Reviews.Title: CCD camera (metal body).
Reviews.Author: ALAN "Master"
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for low light use,image quality better than a Cmos cameras.Easy install ,Always use a good quality cable,Don't use thin BNC cable on long distances, interference may appear.

Reviews.Title: Not the same product I ordered before
Reviews.Author: Phongvu
Reviews.Content: I ordered one of these a couple of months ago to replace one of my Zmodo cameras and it worked great.  The camera had a metal housing and was solidly build.  So I ordered another one and when it arrived I was a little disappointed because the housing was plastic and didn't seem as solid.  The camera performed just as well at the first one but I would have liked both of them to be metal.  So be aware you may not get the same product twice.4/29/13 - Update - The camera started having problems: going dark, colors reversed, looking washed out, etc.  And then it just quit working altogether.  Connections were fine and the other camera like this I purchased (the metal one) is under cover, so I am not sure if it completely weather proof. I hooked up an extra camera I had to make sure the connection was fine and there were no problems.  So if you would like a camera that lasts less than a year, this is the one to buy!

Reviews.Title: affordable but good quality
Reviews.Author: Julie Mantrish
Reviews.Content: affordable but good quality.wider angel than bullet cams and has a better pic than the ones that my kit came with.Good color and has great night vision.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Reginald Blanchard
Reviews.Content: i received it on time in the mail, hooked it up and it worked just fine for my needs.  This is worth the money!  It's been about a year now and still works good

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Day Night Vision Outdoor CCD CCTV Security Dome Camera...
Reviews.Author: Thomas Phillips
Reviews.Content: WENT THROUGH ALLOT OF CAMERAS AND FOR THIS PRICE YOU CAN'T BEAT IT.NIGHT VISION IS MUCH BETTERTHAN THE OTHER I HAD THAT WERE SUPPOSE TO BE GREAT. THEY COME IN WHITE OR BLACK AND ALSO YOU MIGHT BE ABLE TO USE YOUR EXISTING CABLES TOO.

Reviews.Title: Better than average
Reviews.Author: Cuffy
Reviews.Content: Though not an expensive camera, this dome eye works great and sees extremely well in darkness, with clear images to the DVR.  White wasn't available when I needed my cameras, so I just painted the housings on the two I got and was in business.  Very simple "plug 'n' play" installation, and the mounts are easy to screw to any surface.

Reviews.Title: Home security
Reviews.Author: GILFOYLE MASON
Reviews.Content: This was add to my security system, the night vision is just right for my home, and I will purchase some more for my home.

Reviews.Title: Great quality video
Reviews.Author: Aaron L. Dunphy
Reviews.Content: I have a zmodo system with the free cameras that come with it.  This cam offers a crisper picutre and a wider view.  I'd buy more

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Dave "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Being my first CCD I have now learned a few things about the camera that I thought I would pass along.  I set this up at one end of my 3 car garage and the IR LED are actually so bright that the reflection from the wall on the far side 30+ft away whites pretty much everything out. As such I had to set it up pointing at an angle to wall rather than straight on.  Next, the picture indicates the led glowing blue but in fact, they glow red in the dark and are about as bright as an alarm clock.  Next, although I am using it inside, I would question the suitability for the outdoor rating especially in snowy conditions.  On the back side of the ball that holds the camera, there are grates directly into the electronics (presumably to vent the heat) and that front edge of the camera has that gap which goes right to them.  As for the picture, I would say it is just ok.  Again at night if you are right in front of the camera, you will just be a white blob.  During the day it is plain low def and I will probably just go to using HD web cams with the lights turned on by a motion sensor.

Reviews.Title: Update on Bad night time quality
Reviews.Author: badge923
Reviews.Content: Great day time quality but a pretty bad picture at night. You night be able to see 10 feet at night.UPDATE: After changing the angle I had them mounted. The night picture is amazing. They were mounded under the eve of the house pointed to the street and quality was really bad. I changed where I had them mounted and put them vertical pointed to the street and I can clearly see houses and people walking around 100 feet away at night.

Reviews.Title: Made in China.  No warranty other than what Amazon provides (30 Days).
Reviews.Author: CSRTech
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 3 of these in the last several months.  They come as described and work with an acceptable picture.  Great value for the price unless one dies more than 30 days after you purchase it; then you'll have to eat it.  The VideoSecu website has no support area and if you write a negative review there it will never see the light of day.  So now that you're informed you can make the decision to buy or not.  You know what the risks are.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: warren
Reviews.Content: Set up was a breeze. Great camera for day and night. You can mount it upside down or on a wall stays in place wear you set it.

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Average Quality
Reviews.Author: Scott Smith
Reviews.Content: Ordered 4 of these cameras. After installing them, 1 was did not work. Return was easy. Also ordered 2 of similar camera with better quality images and same price that the picture looked better on.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Wanda Hardwic-Ekon
Reviews.Content: using it outside and it has been performing well even in the awful weather we have had this winter, would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: night vision horrid
Reviews.Author: Christopher Beaudoin
Reviews.Content: good material construction. daytime picture is ciear, nighttime vision is horrid. Was hoping for better quality night vision, color distorted at night

Reviews.Title: Can't beat performance to price ratio
Reviews.Author: Angel P.
Reviews.Content: I been using these cameras from a couple of months now.  They are still running strong, can't wait to purchase 4 more.

Reviews.Title: Plug in and go
Reviews.Author: whatdoiknow?
Reviews.Content: I plugged in to the wall and used the cable I bought to plug into my DVr. Worked immediately !  No fuss, no muss, image came right up on the monitor and I could also see it on my iPhone.  Pleased with how easy that was.  Image seems to be very good.  Happy with my purchase  After I use it and if all is well I will upgrade to five stars

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal!
Reviews.Author: Chad Brawley
Reviews.Content: The quality is outstanding. Amzing how cheap it was and I am very happy with it. Great picture and can see in pitch darkness!

Reviews.Title: good enough
Reviews.Author: Leonard Lander
Reviews.Content: set up was two minutes hooked to my dvr to replace to broken units from a storm, price was right

Reviews.Title: I have two already and I am going to buy 2 more.
Reviews.Author: J. Gehrman "FatTire"
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these cameras, and day in and day out through all kinds of weather in the Pac Northwest these cameras work perfectly.  I have had several other bullet cameras but they always seem to get misaligned after a big storm and I have had 2 previous bullet cameras fail on me.  Not these guys, they dont fog up and have even been working with ice hanging off them.  The IR is good for about 25-30 ft for any real detail I can see my car perfectly and the camera is mounted on a high second story deck above the car.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: Camera does a good job. Does exactly as specified. Works great with my CCTV system. I would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Replacement camera for current system
Reviews.Author: NIYAH R. CHAPPELL
Reviews.Content: Works well with my security system! It was easy to install and operate using the same connectors as the previous unit!

Reviews.Title: Great item, NO instructions.....
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Durham "Survival Advisor"
Reviews.Content: I use this on the top front of my little RV for added/nighttime vision.  It works extremely well.  The range in the dark seems to be the advertised 50 ft.  In fact, driving with high beam headlights, I get a better view through the camera and 7 in. TFT monitor than through the windshield!  I have driven at 45 mph on the camera only with no additional lights (not recommended).  The center part must be "popped out" to access the mounting points inside the housing.  Be careful, or you may damage the housing and lose the tight fit.  I put "Goop" on the joints once I had it adjusted.  The reason for 4 stars is simply that it had no instructions.....  I will update on longevity and durability later.  Since installing a second unit as a rear view camera, I was reminded how important it is to keep the view of the light sensor (the little red item directly under the camera lens)so it has a wide open view of what you want to see.  It is also imperative to keep ANYTHING from reflecting infrared light from the LED's back into the camera.  Otherwise, in the dark, you will get a cloudy, blurred image.  Installed properly these cameras are amazing....

Reviews.Title: not for night
Reviews.Author: Chung T. Nieh "bronzeram"
Reviews.Content: It works great when you have bright light. No good for night. You may consider install it with motion activited light.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: A. Lewis "OBNXS1"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't even get this up to see what kind of picture it provided. The threads on the mounting plate are a mess. You've got about 1/2 a thread to catch to screw it on but you can't even get close to it because of the rubber stops for the camera. Then even if you could get the camera screwed on to the mounting plate, you can't adjust it because it's so tight to the rubber stops without even screwing it all the way on. And good luck adjusting it before screwing it on. I spent 15-20 minutes just trying to screw the camera to the base without even worrying about adjustment so I could at least see what picture looked like and finally said to Hell with it. Returning ASAP.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Debra Gallagher
Reviews.Content: This little camera was my first try at the whole security camera thing. I have it installed to keep an extra eye on my chicken coop, but so far I have had a blast watching the wildlife out there. I'm sure there is better out there but I love this little camera!!

Reviews.Title: FAIRLY GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: D_MAN1925
Reviews.Content: THE PRODUCT SEEM TO BE WORKING JUST FINE,BUT THE POWER SUPPLY THAT CAME WITH THE CAMERA DIDN'T WORKED.WHAT'S UP!OTHER THAN THAT IT'S OK.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jocelyn Carpenter
Reviews.Content: This is a great little add-on to your video security set.  It doesn't rotate, but mostly us it fixed for the front door.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: JRM "JRM in Ohio"
Reviews.Content: Worked as advertised...good picture, I'll be purchasing more like this one in the near future, it is muchless obvious than bullet types...One hardly notices it if mounted on ceiling, or high up.

Reviews.Title: Excelent buy
Reviews.Author: F. Loehrer "Franko"
Reviews.Content: For the price, its a good buy.  The picture is crisp and clear and the night vision exceeded my expectations.  It clearly lights up at least 70 ft square area.. I have an 8 camera system. Am going to buy 2 more to replace a couple areas where the night vision is needed.. My current cameras have run 24/7 for 25 years now.. Hope this last as long. Installation was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: One of the best.
Reviews.Author: BigJohn "Big John"
Reviews.Content: One of the best for the money. It has pretty fair resolution, and the night vision is quite good. 1

Reviews.Title: Camera replacement
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: I purchased a couple of Sony cameras which the IR went out within 2 months of purchase. I was looking for a replacement camera and found this VideoSecu work nicely for this purpose. Well constructed and clear picture up to about 25 feet.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME DEAL!
Reviews.Author: ALEXANDER ROBLES
Reviews.Content: These cameras are awesome, for the price and quality you can't go wrong. They do very well in low lying ceiling buildings. The case on them is all metal and durable design. This camera will also give you a very wide view , it covers alot of space with a good quality picture. This is important to consider when buying a wide view lens camera. I install about 30 of these a month that is in a partime business which is growing steadily. I give them 2 thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Not the clearest camera.
Reviews.Author: Frederick Scott
Reviews.Content: If you are looking to keep and eye on a small area this camera can work for you.  Something like the front door.  However, for a backyard or a larger area.  I recommend something with a higher TVL, and more LEDs.  Overall, it is a good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Well built camera housing. Very good picture quality, Color during the day light hours and black and white at night. The led's are super bright.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT VALUE!  I bought more!!
Reviews.Author: Firefighter "Blu-Ray addict"
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of these cameras along with 2- Evertech CCTV Security Camera - 700 TVL, 36 IR, 2,8~12mm Wide Angle ZOOM Vari-focal Lens Metal Dome Cameras to replace the bullet cameras that came with my Zmodo system because I needed wider angles to get the entire store.  I am VERY PLEASED with this camera.  So pleased I just ordered 4 more of this one because for the cost difference this one is all I needed.  If you are wanting to upgrade your cameras, this is the one if you are on a budget.  If not, go for the Evertech but there really isn't enough difference other than the zoom lens to justify paying twice the price of these.  Great camera!!  Get them!

Reviews.Title: Solid camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Tony Hamilton "NYC Real Estate Investor"
Reviews.Content: This camera is well made. It's solid not flimsy. It installls firmly and nicely on the wall, Most importantly the picture quality is great. The colors are more vibrant than the zmodo camera it replaced. It also has a wide angle so you get to see over a larger area. I'm going to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Aaron Bohner
Reviews.Content: I bought eight to replace all my bullet cams. Viewing angle is great, day and night picture. Have recommended to lots of other people.

Reviews.Title: Great daylight vision
Reviews.Author: starstruck
Reviews.Content: This camera gives an impressive daylight image and is easy to install and aim. There is a lot of room for improvement in the night vision and I was able to rig up something that did improve it but the manufacturer could have done it better for a very modest increase in the cost. The problem with the night vision is that the LEDs are so bright that they reflect off of any near object and cause overexposure of the entire image. To make the night vision better I constructed a paper filter with tiny holes in it to cover the circle of LEDs and thus lower their light output. Works great but I should not have had to do it! Some simple adjustable filter over the LEDs should be part of the camera in the first place. Of course if the camera is only imaging distant objects the filter is unnecessary, that's why the filter needs to be user adjustable.

Reviews.Title: Good wide angle camera, great for upgrading other system's included camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've upgraded 2 of my Zmodo cameras to these because of the increased quality and wider viewing angle.  These cameras show color much more true and are really wide.  If you're upgrading from other cameras you may want to move them closer since they're so much wider.  Overall, solid mount and easy adjustment.  The LEDs do a good job if you have the camera pointed toward the ground.  But, motion detecting flood lights do a much better job at showing detail at night as opposed to relying on the LEDs.  I would consider buying more of these as I need upgrades.

Reviews.Title: Camera is ok.
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Item was ok. Cords are quite short to be placed outdoors so that stinks. Wouldn't pay more than $25-30 on product.

Reviews.Title: Good for Only 1 Year!
Reviews.Author: TESTER
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these little cameras for added protection for my home. Thay worked great for a while but then noticed the LED night vision on both cameras started to get dimmer and dimmer. I now have to leave the lights on at night. These cameras are not much of a "wide angle" camera so you will need to install them 3 stories up. These cameras are built well but need some improvment.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for......
Reviews.Author: James D Carroll, Sr.
Reviews.Content: I agree with Greg in Nashville. Everything seems just too bright & peachey for me to believe that a lot of these reviews are written by company reps. While I do like the camera... , the resolution is very good (not great) during the day, the night vision isn't that good. Also, I don't know how these people are recording with this camera (motion or otherwise). I tried it on two different systems including my new Zmodo 8- Channel DVR and can't record with it. I can take still shots but again, can't record. Other than that...., it's a nice little camera for the price. Remember people...., you get what you pay for.......  :-)Jim from Saratoga Springs, New York

Reviews.Title: worst video quality ever
Reviews.Author: Twisted tattoo
Reviews.Content: the video quality on these is absolutely horrible. the picture is extremely pixilated. the description of this camera says "It provides you sharp images with color at daytime" that is a blatant lie.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera -- Inexpensive Price
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I have a 16 camera system at my business. I always keep extra cameras on hand for when my older cameras fail. (I've had some with a seven year life and others with a six month life.) I've replaced some of my older Sony cameras with these and I have to say that the resolution is better than my older Sonys. These are totally better than some more expensive Lorex cameras that I bought a Frys. I'll buy these again when I need more cameras.

Reviews.Title: Ok, security camera
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: The video images is clear during daylight.  Night images is hard to see unless something is within a few feet from the camera.

Reviews.Title: Worked for a year then half-broke but otherwise it is decent for the price.
Reviews.Author: C. Sulto
Reviews.Content: The camera is of decent quality and has a decent image for the price both day and night.  One unit suddenly went black about a year later.  I reset power and it worked again for a day then went black again.  If I power cycle it daily I get a day of video before it goes out again.For the price it is good enough as it's only one of several cameras I use.  I have it a remote site where the temperature goes below zero in the winter.  This is the only one that broke of several so it not endemic to the model as I see it.The night mode is decent as well but I have some other Sony CCD based ones that look much better however they cost 5x as much too.  With 960H or even D1 recording, most of these cameras are good enough within 20ft or so.  If you need long distance or super fine resolution, than more expensive cameras do make a difference especially if you have higher resolution recording.

Reviews.Title: great  camera  super  cool
Reviews.Author: carl  patterson
Reviews.Content: everything  is as discribe  great  item  i  realy  love  them i would buy anytime and  recommend  them  to  friends they  are  great

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Debra Gallagher
Reviews.Content: This little camera was my first try at the whole security camera thing. I have it installed to keep an extra eye on my chicken coop, but so far I have had a blast watching the wildlife out there. I'm sure there is better out there but I love this little camera!!

Reviews.Title: Vague install directions.
Reviews.Author: Denver F
Reviews.Content: No explaination about mounting. Very unclear in product manuals how to mount as well.Great looking product overall, for the price.

Reviews.Title: works very well- good value
Reviews.Author: Alexander Chow "alleychow"
Reviews.Content: We have a Q-see security system from Costco and I wanted to add two cameras at the front entry way and indoor foyer, but I wanted cameras that were not as obtrusive as the bullet style cameras that were included with the original system. These worked very well, were easy to install, and the picture quality is similar to the original cameras. The outer casing is metal and thus feels very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: works very well- good value
Reviews.Author: Alexander Chow "alleychow"
Reviews.Content: We have a Q-see security system from Costco and I wanted to add two cameras at the front entry way and indoor foyer, but I wanted cameras that were not as obtrusive as the bullet style cameras that were included with the original system. These worked very well, were easy to install, and the picture quality is similar to the original cameras. The outer casing is metal and thus feels very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: chelsea
Reviews.Content: really great picture. gives clear view. happy with product.  able to view clearly nice distance from camera. good buy, ,,

Reviews.Title: Very Effective
Reviews.Author: Cletu
Reviews.Content: Been using this camera for over a week now, great day & night vision, easy outdoor installation & hook-up. Good camera for the quality & price.

Reviews.Title: video secu wide angle oudoor camera
Reviews.Author: david w.
Reviews.Content: these cameras work well.the wide angle lens shows a large area.  color is good.  Good quality foe a low price.  Much better than swann. The night vision goes about 30 feet, a bit limited.  Camera helped catch dog chasing sheep.  The camera shot by crazy guy had a bullet hole through it.  Might need to get bullet proof version

Reviews.Title: Good Quality for the price
Reviews.Author: Olson
Reviews.Content: I am using this with the B001HBP9ZC Balun with cat5e and the quality is very good day & night. IR distance is about 20 feet for me. I'll by more.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Timothy
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera it is very good and it was the right camera for what I need it for

Reviews.Title: great wide angle camera
Reviews.Author: Michael R Mancuso
Reviews.Content: Bought two of them.  one for security and one for RV backup camera.  Like the wide view angle for both.  Excellent color and excellent night view.  With the RV I run the video signal through a small coax for about 50 feet and find the signal is excellent at the small video monitor.  For the security camera it, I see all of my front yard and most of the street.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Really Great Camera
Reviews.Author: ANTONIO N AGNEW
Reviews.Content: I Install home security for a living and these are some of the best cameras I've ever used these are a good buy !

Reviews.Title: Metal housing...not the old plastic crap.
Reviews.Author: Greg Mansheim
Reviews.Content: Do not expect a high-grade resolution(HD) from this camera; however, the construction was better than previous models and came quickly. Very solid. Good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey C Parker
Reviews.Content: These are great little cameras. Color is good right outa the box, clear day or night vision. Easy to install & aim too. Better than the original cameras that came with my Z Modo system. No, I don't work for the company :)

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Robert payne
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to use with our Zmodo camera system, we installed this camera on our porch looking at the front door so we could see who is on the porch. Camera had a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great day/night kittycam
Reviews.Author: Tracy J. Jacobsen "grannycat"
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with this camera I just bought another.  The original I placed on the front porch to monitor traffic 24/7.  The picture is clear, in color(daytime) and bright as day at night.  I was convinced to buy it by other reviews and they were right on.  Don't hesitate if you want an inexpensive security cam.  This is great!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is as advertised and my famnily really likes it! We have it on our chimney over seeing the street and our neighbors yard. Just in case some tries jumping yards.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: plazmaniac
Reviews.Content: Works well, can see up to 100 feet or so at night with good identifiability up to 30 feet or so. Well made it appears with a black oxide finished aluminum housing. So far so good!

Reviews.Title: You don't get what you paid for.
Reviews.Author: Newcrow
Reviews.Content: With this camera; you will not get what you paid for. You will, instead, receive the likes of four times more camera than what you have paid for in the purchase. Take the camera challenge and order one. As with any camera, it helps if you understand how to place the camera as well as the expectations of the view of your intent. All-in-all, I am more than satisfied with the purchase. However, usually, I do not touch a camera that is sub 500 lines but the video quality of this camera is more than I was expecting for a sub 500 line camera... I stand corrected. Be sure that you have an adequate power supply and keep direct light away from the lens. I think that I am going to be replacing all of the cameras in my business with these cameras. PLEASE USE GOOD CABLES - HIGHLY RECOMMEND RG6 COAX!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price
Reviews.Author: T. Carter
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these to replace some bullet cameras that stopped working. I must say that these are far better. The look better and the image is a ton better even thought they are only 480 lines.I do have one slight problem (if you call it a problem).  One of my cameras in installed under an easement which is about 15 feet high on the porch. The over hang forces me to direct the camera down a little (which is fine) but do to the clearance, I can't see out as far as I like. To be fair, the bullet camera that was there before didn't see out much further. At least I can get a clearer picture with this one.I do recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Morgan "CPNTECH"
Reviews.Content: Great VideoSecu Day Night Vision Outdoor CCD CCTV Security Dome Camera is a good quality for the price. It is easy to setup works fantastic for the price. I  do recommend this.

Reviews.Title: awesome night vision
Reviews.Author: el rondon
Reviews.Content: bought this cam together with swann 2550 as an extra cam and blows away  the 550 cameras that came with swann unit,it lighths up my driveway with the infrared where the swann 550 cams barely produce any infrared light output,I  wish I would have  known how bad swann cams were I would have  biuld my system with videosecu cams instead of buying the whole swann package.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rob P
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly. Easy to install and to hook up the unit. Produces an awesome imagine even at night. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: PastorBob
Reviews.Content: Works great easy to install and works with exsisting equipment without any changes,  this is what we wanted and needed.

Reviews.Title: Surprised.
Reviews.Author: Diver Dave
Reviews.Content: Was surprised at the quality of view. I got this to replace a similar one that had a blurry view from another vendor, but this was an easy switch.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: M. Allshouse "SleepSolutionsOfFredericksburg"
Reviews.Content: We have this installed at our medical facility. Installation is quick and easy, just perfect for what we need it for.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Greg Vaughn "Greg Vaughn"
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my store to replace the aging cameras there. They are 100% clearer and the color is a bit more vivid compared to my old set. The quality is unsurpassed for the price your paying.

Reviews.Title: For the price...  Great camera.
Reviews.Author: AZHOOSIER
Reviews.Content: Night vision is by far the best compared to the current Zmodo cameras I have.  Would recommend and will probably purchase one or two more.

Reviews.Title: how i rated this product
Reviews.Author: artist04
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because it is the best for this product. I liked every thing about it ,it is serving  its purpose. I would recommend it to every one who need a camera like this, it is worth it.

Reviews.Title: clear and has a great wide angle lens
Reviews.Author: K& R MotorSports
Reviews.Content: works great adjusting it was slightly difficult but i was able to lock in my angle, night vision was good compared to my other cams

Reviews.Title: good cam for the price
Reviews.Author: jack
Reviews.Content: i hooked this up to my 12 ch dvr and works great good quality picture i  would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: PIP
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for our front door. Picture was clear though a little dark in the evenings. It was very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Good budget Camera
Reviews.Author: BKSpyke
Reviews.Content: I bought the first one of these to overcome the narrow field of view of the original cameras that came with my system. One of these covers the same area it took two to cover, completely eliminating one of the cameras in my bedroom. The IR LEDs also have more of a flood lighting effect than the spot effect of the originals. The only serious downfall so far is the "vandal-proof" design is more of "installation resistant", the openings for the connection cable are to small for the cable making it difficult to mount and align. All in all worth the money though

Reviews.Title: So far very happy
Reviews.Author: TysonR
Reviews.Content: This camera does exactly what I needed, it can see a pretty wide area, has a cool little design that is hard to tell what it is unless you can see the lense... colors seem good, night works good... 5 star

Reviews.Title: Impossible to adjust
Reviews.Author: Kevin Baltodano R
Reviews.Content: Here I have the camera on the box because we could not adjust the angle of the lens. It's way too hard, seems like it's stuck. I asked the seller for help and offered me a refund, which is not useful for me because I live in Costa Rica and would have to pay the shipping costs from here. It's very dissapointing that the seller does not offer any help, and the instructions sheet is useless.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: good for close range has a good picure for the price and seems to be a camera that will last for a long time!! I think that anyone would like a camera like this, I probley will be buying a cuple more.

Reviews.Title: security dome camera,  prompt seller , good price
Reviews.Author: Hazeline Tucker
Reviews.Content: this little dome camera is a good  product and gives perfect pictures I would not be without it.  It was a good price too

Reviews.Title: i liked my video secu dome camera ....
Reviews.Author: Rebeca Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: i liked my video secu dome camera .... but i did not recived the cables that are meant to come with the camera (the yellow and black ones)

Reviews.Title: purchased 16 and 15 were great
Reviews.Author: Robert Rushton
Reviews.Content: 15/16 and i belive i was the cause of the one that failed, so i still give 5/5.for the price i can't complain, but if install requires better definition you need a camera priced around $100

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Magyver
Reviews.Content: I use this as a security camera via modulators. I have 2 of these now and they have decent picture during the day, quite nice colors.  The night vision is decent too.  I love this camera, it would get 5 stars if it had a mic.So far no issues, the images are not crystal clear, but for this pricepoint, they are great. You can make out faces no problem, but if asked what color their eyes were, that won't happen.  Both of my camera's are under soffits so they are not exposed to direct rain, but do get a little wet. They have not seen a winter yet, but its coming and we will see how they fair in cold weather.I recommend this camera for general purposes. If you need uber crisp detail, this can't do it. but for general surveillance, it can't be beat (for the price)Like I said, my only gripe is the lack of a mic.

Reviews.Title: Excellent day/night time camera.
Reviews.Author: Lloyd W. Hayes "Lloyd"
Reviews.Content: Very easy to mount with up to 4 screws through a detachable base. You provide the screws. (I only used 2 screws to mount it.) Wire can be run straight through mounting base plate or out though side. Excellent image day or night. I'm using this camera inside. The night time image looks as bright as day time. The instructions say that this camera can be used both inside and outside.Nothing to complain about. It works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: CCTV Cameras
Reviews.Author: ACE
Reviews.Content: These cameras were replacement for cameras purchased at the time of the system installation. What I thought was a cable problem turned out to be a problem with the first cameras installed. These cameras are chrystal clear during the day, and at night time the camera picks up images as far as 50' in total black conditions. I pan to order some more of these to replace existing cameras that do not have good night vision.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Outdoor Dome Night Vision IR CCD Security Camera 420TVL with Free Power Supply 1Z0
Reviews.Author: J Seiler
Reviews.Content: VideoSecu Outdoor Dome Night Vision IR CCD Security Camera 420TVL with Free Power Supply 1Z0Purchased this camera for its wider angle view then the standard cameras that came with my Night Owl FS-85000 DVR system.The dome camera is very sturdy all metal, its a very clean design and easy to mount and conceals all wires and mounting hardwareThe color is much better (truer colors) then my standard cameras that came with my system and wider angle as well.The night vision is good for the area I have it in which is my front porch area that is able 8ft high and 4ft by 4ft, the LED's can be seen but seem to be dimmer then my other cameras and do stand out as much.The motion activation feature on my DVR works with this camera.This camera is NOT a PTZ but is aim-able in a wide range of angles and will stay fixed in that position and is not easily moved once set(a vandal could NOT knock it out of viewing position without a ladder and being seen)I am very please with the quality build of this camera and have purchased 2 more for other locations around my home.I intend to prime and repaint the body my house color to help it blend and be even less noticeable...

Reviews.Title: Great buys
Reviews.Author: Amy Faison
Reviews.Content: I have purchased around 40 of these over past year and have been very pleased with the performance and overall look of the cameras. I did have one that wasn't sealed well enough and eventually got water on the inside but the placement of the camera on the edge of roofline contributed to the over excess of water. Will continue to order these cams throughout the year

Reviews.Title: Small add in camera
Reviews.Author: Jay Wadsworth
Reviews.Content: This camera has a tendency to distort images it is displaying on the DVR. Godd straight on alignment is necessarry to get the right perspective

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent resolution
Reviews.Author: Vegas052
Reviews.Content: This camera is 480 tvl but is real good resolution for now,i don't have any complain the quality picture at night looks excellent and very ease to mount on the wall has everything you need to make sure you install the camera correctly i definitely recommend this camera to any person with a tight budget but really need a good security camera i will buy one more of this camera i need 3 but for now i will buy another one don't be afraid i was because of the price but now i know is real good thank you

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kevin S
Reviews.Content: Great wide angle lens and night vision. I use this on my front door to see who's there when in bedroom. And I just love it.

Reviews.Title: great extra set of eyes
Reviews.Author: smiley
Reviews.Content: im very impressed my first ever camra it just wat i needed i have a blind spot from my room but not any more . would by again.

Reviews.Title: Great picture at night
Reviews.Author: CHARLES E LAWRENCE
Reviews.Content: I did not expect the night time view would be this clear and in color with low light view.  A little difficult to get aline when you need an 45 degree angle. This is an excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: NOT AMAZON'S FAULT
Reviews.Author: BargainFinder "BargainFinder"
Reviews.Content: I purchased these THINKING they were wireless and have had to return them.  They are not wireless cameras, but hook directly to your TV (CCTV).  However, I do not fault Amazon at all with this.  THEY FULFILLED their end in shipping fast and packaging was great.Next time, I will READ MORE CAREFULLY ;-)Thank you so much Amazon for making it SO EASY to return these 2 items (yes, I had to pay a small return fee of around $6), but it was understandable as it was my error.Amazon has a great return policy, which I think is so much better than eBay!

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: lowriderminis
Reviews.Content: Difficult for man of the house to install. I had to look up instructions and call company before properly installing. All you get is the camera in a box. True test of who is the problem solver in the family.

Reviews.Title: Good cctv for the price
Reviews.Author: T. khouv "TK"
Reviews.Content: I've been been install many cctv for the last 20 year, this is  the best for the money you can buy, the night vision work very well you can see in color at night with very little light,  You will not regret them . I do not write too many review on a product because my english are very poor but for this one I must share if I do not I feel quilty for these year that I been read other review .  thank you for taking your time to read.

Reviews.Title: Have not used yet
Reviews.Author: William B.
Reviews.Content: A good backup if one camera fail for some reason. From reading the camera is one of the best on market.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Tech/Handy Guy 001
Reviews.Content: Just the color I need for it to remain hidden in it location."I do not know why this stupid things wants so more many freakin words just to post, GOSH!

Reviews.Title: what can I say
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: What can I say I didnt pay attention to the reviews but I would say you get your,"bang for your buck." remember always look at the reviews.

Reviews.Title: I can't use it
Reviews.Author: John Raff
Reviews.Content: I mistakenly ordered the ANALOG camera when I really wanted an IP Camera.My fault.I really don't have any use for it.Sorry!

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Carl Burkholder
Reviews.Content: Order was incomplete, no remote, no srickers I returned it. Not sure if it worked or not as I needed the remote to operate it

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Celson Hubner Junior
Reviews.Content: I look by internet in site amazon.I  by for me and my son.I don't recommend For every oneThe price is very good

ProductInfo.Features:
Outdoor/Indoor security and surveillance weatherproof CCD camera
Build-in 20 Infrared Leds security camera, 0 Lux. Night vision
480 TV Lines. Small size, discreet installation
Built in f 3.6mm Lens for wide view angle
Bonus power supply 12 V DC, bonus security decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Day Night Vision Outdoor CCD CCTV Security Dome Camera Vandal-proof 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens 480TVL with Bonus Power Supply 1Z0
